text: Bamrung Boonprom (, born 22 April 1977) is a retired Thai professional footballer who played as a Striker player. He was awarded the Asian Young Footballer of the Year by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) in 1996. He played at 1997 FIFA U-17 World Championship in Egypt. ==International career== ==Honours== ===Individual=== * Asian Young Footballer of the Year : 1996 ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:People from Suphan Buri Province Category:Thai footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Suphanburi F.C. players Category:Bangkok Bank F.C. players Category:Thai League 1 players Category:Asian Young Footballer of the Year winners
title: Bamrung Boonprom
